name: Online Registration Form
description: Newsletter registration form with mobile-first design. Implemented custom checkbox, radio button design to match design specs.

name: Performance Optimization
description: Improved performance by reducing HTTP requests and optimizing file sizes.  Used gulp plugins gulp-minify, gulp-concat and gulp-inline-img as well as svg images.

name: Web App Dashboard
description: Built front-end for mock web application using mobile-first design, Angular 1.4.8, Chart.js, localStorage

name: Interactive Video Player
description: Video player with custom controls that show on hover. Transcript is synced with captions, with highlighted clickable sections, which is parsed from a VTT file to allow it to be a reusable module.

name: Public Api
description: Used AJAX to pull JSON data from a public API. Also used CSS flexbox and a custom modal window.

name: Ideal Karma
description: Front-end for hackathon collaboration. Built according to design specs, including Chart.js graphs and jQuery animations
